tosdr.case: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
quoteText: Upon Comcast's receipt of a satisfactory notice of claimed infringement, Comcast will respond expeditiously either directly or indirectly (i) to remove the allegedly infringing work(s) from the Comcast Web Services or (ii) to disable access to the work(s).
